# OneNoteProxy.CreateNewPage method

Create a new, minimal page in a OneNote section.

```csharp
public string CreateNewPage(string sectionID)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| sectionID | ID of the section to create the page in |

## Return Value

OneNote ID of the new page
